name: Anna A. PERRY v. Linwood G. HOWARD, Jr.

parties: Anna A. PERRY v. Linwood G. HOWARD, Jr.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The defendant’s motion to affirm the judgment of the Superior Court pursuant to Rule 16(g) is granted.

attorneys: Quinn, Cuzzone & Geremia, John F. Cuz-zone, Jr., Providence, for plaintiff.
Gunning, LaFazia & Gnys, Inc., Netti C. Vogel, Providence, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
Anna A. PERRY v. Linwood G. HOWARD, Jr.
No. 79-185-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Nov. 16, 1979.
Quinn, Cuzzone & Geremia, John F. Cuz-zone, Jr., Providence, for plaintiff.
Gunning, LaFazia & Gnys, Inc., Netti C. Vogel, Providence, for defendant.
